text: Anna hiked up a hill near her house and heard a distant melody echoing from snow-capped mountains.
scene: Anna standing on a grassy hill with mountains in the distance, hand cupped to her ear listening

text: A silver whistle lay at her feet. When she blew it gently, a bridge of sound formed between peaks.
scene: Anna holding a small silver whistle, glowing musical notes forming a bridge toward the mountains

text: She stepped onto the sound bridge and found herself in a valley where music was tangled in the wind.
scene: Anna walking on a glowing musical note bridge into a mountain valley, notes swirling in the air

text: Echo spirits greeted her. "Our mountain song is broken," they said. "Can you help us mend the melody?"
scene: gentle translucent echo spirits hovering, speaking to Anna, mountains towering behind

text: They led her to a frozen waterfall whose icicles were silent instead of chiming.
scene: icicle waterfall with no sound, Anna touching the ice, echo spirits watching

text: Anna tapped each icicle with the whistle, tuning them until a soft harmony rang out.
scene: Anna tapping icicles like chimes, different colors glowing as they tune

text: Higher up, stone drums sat cracked and dusty. She patched them with warm resin from pine trees.
scene: Anna spreading resin on cracked stone drums in a mountain clearing, pines around

text: She played a simple rhythm. Birds joined in, flapping their wings like gentle percussion.
scene: Anna tapping the drums, birds flapping in time, echo spirits smiling

text: A gust carried lost music sheets into a thorn bush. Anna carefully freed each one.
scene: Anna pulling glowing music sheets from a thorny bush, notes swirling off the pages

text: The notes fluttered back into the sky, forming constellations that hummed above the peaks.
scene: musical notes forming glowing constellations in the sky above mountains

text: At the summit, a grand bell hung silent because its clapper was missing.
scene: large mountain bell hanging between rocks, empty inside, Anna looking up

text: Anna braided a clapper from her bootlace and a smooth river stone, tying it firmly inside the bell.
scene: Anna attaching a handmade clapper to the bell, mountains stretching behind

text: When she rang it, the whole valley answered. Snowflakes danced in perfect time with the melody.
scene: Anna ringing the bell, waves of music over the valley, snowflakes swirling in rhythm

text: The echo spirits wove the now-complete song into a glowing scarf and wrapped it around her shoulders.
scene: echo spirits placing a shimmering musical scarf on Anna, notes drifting from it

text: "This will keep any song from getting lost," they whispered.
scene: close-up of Anna holding the scarf, tiny notes glowing on the fabric

text: On the way down, she taught the birds the new tune. They carried it to every ridge.
scene: birds flying between peaks, carrying lines of notes, Anna watching from the bridge

text: The sound bridge shimmered back toward her hill. The mountains played the melody, strong and clear.
scene: glowing bridge of notes leading back, mountains glowing with music behind her

text: She stepped back onto her hill just as the last note faded into the evening breeze.
scene: Anna standing on the grassy hill at dusk, distant peaks softly glowing

text: Around her neck, the musical scarf hummed a gentle lullaby.
scene: Anna holding the scarf, small notes floating around her head

text: At home, when she set the scarf by her window, the night filled with the mountain song once more.
scene: scarf glowing on the windowsill of Anna's room at night, stars outside twinkling in time
